remarks: The Yoneda Lemma.  The Yoneda embedding, the curried Hom functor, is full and faithful, and hence is a representation of the category ` C ` as a full subcategory of the category ` Q ` of presheaves on ` C ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2017.)
statement:
yonffth.y $e |- Y = ( Yon ` C ) $.
yonffth.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
yonffth.s $e |- S = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
yonffth.q $e |- Q = ( O FuncCat S ) $.
yonffth.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
yonffth.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
yonffth.h $e |- ( ph -> ran ( Homf ` C ) C_ U ) $.
yonffth $p |- ( ph -> Y e. ( ( C Full Q ) i^i ( C Faith Q ) ) ) $.
